      Constructors in eu.zidek.augustin.minuscule with parameters of type Canvas 
      Constructor and Description
      CanvasPopUpMenu(Canvas canvas, MinusculeWindow window)
      Creates a new pop up menu
      MLabelPainter(Canvas c)
      MLabelPainter requires access to canvas: it needs to ask the canvas whether Euclidean coordinates are in use or not and draw the labels accordingly.
      PainterManager(Canvas canvas)
      Initializes the PainterManager which makes sure that the same geometric objects share one painter.
